https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eB2OYs3BOng7XQoSnJYMLm17GNK.jpg In the early 1900s, emigrant Hanna returns from Colorado to Finland. In America she was known as Dollar-Hanna, but in Finland she has to endure the Civil War and live through the prohibition. Hanna's independent spirit will guide her. Colorado Avenue
